mapper.insert: insert into pins (pins.member_id, prompt, img_path, width, height, seed, negative_prompt) values (#{memberId}, #{prompt}, #{imagePath}, #{width}, #{height}, #{seed}, #{negativePrompt})
mapper.select: SELECT pins.pin_id, pins.member_id, member.nickname, pins.img_path, pins.prompt, pins.negative_prompt, pins.width, pins.height, pins.seed FROM pins INNER JOIN member ON pins.member_id = member.member_id WHERE member.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY pins.pin_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT pins.pin_id, pins.img_path, pins.prompt, pins.negative_prompt, pins.width, pins.height, pins.seed FROM pins WHERE pins.pin_id = #{pinId}

select count(*) from pins
AND prompt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
